original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 22.4. Kusalattika, Hetusahetukadukādi
Nakusalaṁ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo hetu ceva sahetuko ca
analyzed: na kusalam na hetum ca iva na ahetukañca dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ hetu ca iva sa hetuko ca

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na kusalam na hetum ca iva na ahetukañca dhammam paṭicca

original: abyākato hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
analyzed: abyākataḥ hetu ca iva sa hetukaḥ ca dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā dve

original: (Naakusale dve, naabyākate dve. Paṭhamaṁ gaṇitakena ekaṁ, dutiyaṁ gaṇitakena ekaṁ, tatiyaṁ gaṇitakena ekaṁ, sabbattha nava pañhā.)
analyzed: na akusale dve na abyākate dve paṭhamam gaṇitakena eka dutiyam gaṇitakena eka tatiyam gaṇitakena eka sabbattha nava pañhā

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyāḥ nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate nava

original: Nakusalaṁ naahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: na kusalam na ahetukam ca iva na ca hetum dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ sa hetukaḥ ca iva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate nava

original: Nakusalaṁ nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo hetu ceva hetusampayutto
analyzed: na kusalam na hetum ca iva na hetu vippayuttañca dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ hetu ca iva hetu sampayuttaḥ

original: ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe…
analyzed: ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe

original: avigate nava. (Hetusahetukasadisaṁ.)
Nakusalaṁ nahetuvippayuttañceva nanahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo hetusampayutto
analyzed: na kusalam na hetu vippayuttam ca iva na na hetuñca dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ hetu sampayuttaḥ

original: ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke
analyzed: ca iva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe vipāke

original: tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
Nakusalaṁ nahetuṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na kusalam na hetum na sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ na hetu sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nakusalaṁ nahetuṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na kusalam na hetum na ahetukam dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ na hetu ahetukaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naakusalaṁ nahetuṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na akusalam na hetum na ahetukam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ na hetu ahetukaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naabyākataṁ nahetuṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Gaṇitakena tīṇi pañhā.)
analyzed: na abyākatam na hetum na ahetukam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ na hetu ahetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā gaṇitakena tīṇi pañhā

original: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe aññamaññe tīṇi pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate cha
